TopicTitle: Website youtube video covers the Community buttons

Articles.Content:
The youtube video in the main page of the website covers all the buttons below forums such as http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com and any other if there is some more.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/pud7rhnykza4nhz/%D0%A1%D0%BA%D1%80%D0%B8%D0%BD%D1%88%D0%BE%D1%82%202014-04-04%2018.08.04.png

We know. We really need someone from Squad to go fix the page, but it seems they're all a bit busy with 0.24 at present :/

Hopefully they'll get to it soon.
Looks like the bug was fixed. Thanks
